Event: ... panic attack rollercoaster... black hole of hopeless nothingness... dead and hopeless... no point in the future.
Post: "I'm feeling so lost and hopeless after that panic attack. It's like I'm stuck on a rollercoaster that's taking me straight to a black hole of despair. I can't see any light at the end of the tunnel, just darkness and more suffering. What's the point of even trying when everything seems so futile?"

Event: Mental exhaustion from trying to figure out one's passion and creative side, leading to social anxiety, perfectionism, lack of trust, depression, and envy.
Post: "I'm feeling so burnt out from trying to find my passion and be creative. It's like, I'm just not good enough at anything and it's affecting every aspect of my life. I'm anxious in social situations, I can't stop comparing myself to others, and I just feel like a failure overall. #struggling #creativ block #selfdoubt"

Event: Feeling incredibly tired and lethargic, procrastination, lack of motivation, bad thoughts, fear of one's own brain, feeling at a new low point in life, considering giving up on being happy.
Post: "I'm feeling so lost and hopeless right now. I can't seem to shake off this fatigue and lack of motivation. I'm starting to think that I'm just not cut out for life. #feelinglow #givingup #brainblock"

Event: Going to college has been the worst experience for the individual.
Post: "I'm starting to think that going to college was the biggest mistake of my life. I'm drowning in debt, struggling to find a job, and feeling like a failure in every aspect of my life. #regret #college #failure"

Event: The death of the writer's dad's girlfriend, which has caused them emotional distress and confusion.
Post: "I'm struggling to cope with the loss of my dad's girlfriend. It feels like a part of me is missing, and I can't seem to shake off this feeling of sadness. I keep thinking about how she was such an important person in my life, and now she's gone. It's hard to focus on anything else when everything reminds me of her. I feel like I'm drowning in grief and uncertainty. How can life be so cruel?"

Event: Calling a hotline because you wanted to die and panicking when a woman called your parents.
Post: "I'm such a failure that I couldn't even handle my own problems, had to call a hotline, and now my parents are involved? My life is doomed."

Event: Taking anti-depressants and starting to feel something after being numb for a long time.
Post: "I'm finally starting to feel something again after being numb for so long, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in every aspect of my life. Maybe I'll never be truly happy or successful."

Event: Going to school is easy for some people while feeling difficult and frustrating for others.
Post: "I'm struggling in school, which means I'm probably not cut out for success. I'll never be able to achieve my dreams."

Event: A person is experiencing a social anxiety issue that makes it difficult for them to speak in public, resulting in feelings of fear and embarrassment.
Post: "I'm so nervous about speaking in public. I feel like I'm going to fail and everyone will judge me. I guess I'm just not cut out for this whole socializing thing."

Event: Losing a friend to suicide and being diagnosed with depression and borderline personality disorder.
Post: "I lost my friend to suicide and I'm diagnosed with depression and borderline personality disorder, which means I'm probably destined to be miserable and unsuccessful in every aspect of my life."
